availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Fine clothing and furnishing goods merchants in Louisville, Kentucky. Operated from July 1, 1864, to 1867. Partner(s): Charles G. Jones and P. H. Tapp (1864-1865).

ab.bibl:
"Co-Partnership," Courier-Journal (Louisville, KY), 17 Aug 1864, p. 4.
"Notice." Courier-Journal, (Louisville, KY), 6 Jan 1866, p. 1.
"Co-Partnership Notice," _Courier-Journal, (Louisville, KY), 5 Jan 1867, p. 2.
Edwards' Annual Director to the Inhabitants, Institutions, Incorporated Companies, Manufacturing Establishments, Business firms, Etc., Etc., in the City of Louisville, For 1865-6 (Louisville: Edwards, Greenough & Deved, 1866), 375.
